channel.title: AI on Tech Index
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Tech Index

item.title: Why 2025 Is The Year Of Agentic AI
item.description: Agentic AI is moving from passive chat interfaces to systems that take initiative, execute tasks autonomously, and get real work done. In 2025, these agents are finally maturing into practical tools that save time and boost productivity.

item.title: Using ChatGPT for Automating Your Daily Mail Sending Process
item.description: A detailed guide on using ChatGPT to automate your daily email workflow, saving time and increasing productivity.
